meanings.definition: A type of traditional Indian clothing worn by men.
meanings.sent1: In the hot weather, many men prefer to wear comfortable dhootis.
meanings.sent2: The shop displayed a variety of colorful dhootis for sale.
meanings.sent3: He tried to impress his date by wearing a dhootis to the fancy restaurant.
meanings.sent4: The dhootis wrapped around him like a protective shield.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the dhootis fluttered in the breeze as he walked.

meanings.definition: The act of wearing or using dhootis.
meanings.sent1: His dhootis were neatly folded on the chair, ready to be worn.
meanings.sent2: She admired the grace with which he performed the dhootis.
meanings.sent3: The fashion show featured a segment dedicated to the art of dhootis.
meanings.sent4: He approached the stage confidently, showcasing his skill in dhootis.
meanings.sent5: The traditional dance required precise movements with the dhootis.

meanings.sent1: The dancers twirled gracefully in their vibrant dhootis.
meanings.sent2: The market was bustling with vendors selling various dhootis.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they played dress-up with the colorful dhootis.
meanings.sent4: The festival procession was a sea of swirling dhootis.
meanings.sent5: The sound of bells accompanied the rhythmic swishing of the dhootis.
